Sr[Li 2Al 2O 2N 2]:Eu 2+ (abbreviated SALON) combines the performance of state of the art Eu 2+ based red phosphors with an emission maximum exactly at the desired wavelength of 614 nm
18 . A prototype white pc-LED using SALON confirmed an additional LER benefit of 16% compared to a Sr[LiAl 3N 4]:Eu 2+ containing reference LED
22 , while sustaining an excellent colour rendering index (CRI equals 91, R9 equals 41).
